channel.title: use-cases on Pulsar Neighborhood
channel.description: Recent content in use-cases on Pulsar Neighborhood

item.title: Apache Pulsar Schema versus Schemaless — Who’s the Winner?
item.description: In this article, we’ll examine how Pulsar Schemas work and contrast them with schemaless systems to determine the best approach. We’ll also demonstrate how to use Java clients with Pulsar.
